workflow.wfl_description: Imports a set of files from a directory local to the server.

WorkflowState.wfs_description: The batch import process has started. The progress of the job can be monitored on the 'My Fez' page.

This form sets the default metadata to be applied to each record as it is imported. The title field will be over-written with the name of the file.

If importing from a source that already has metadata such as ePrints, then skip this step.

The collection to be imported must be scanned and copied into a subdirectory in the Fez batch import directory. This form lists the subdirectories found in the Fez import directory. If your directory hasn't been created yet, then create it now and refresh this page.

When done, click 'Set Template' if you want to enter default metadata for each record or go straight to Batch Import if you are importing from ePrints or a source that already has metadata.

workflow.wfl_description: Imports a set of files from a directory local to the server.

WorkflowState.wfs_description: The batch import process has started. The progress of the job can be monitored on the 'My Fez' page.

The collection to be imported must be scanned and copied into a subdirectory in the Fez batch import directory. This form lists the subdirectories found in the Fez import directory. If your directory hasn't been created yet, then create it now and refresh this page.
When done, click 'Set Template' if you want to enter default metadata for each record or go straight to Batch Import if you are importing from ePrints or a source that already has metadata.

This form sets the default metadata to be applied to each record as it is imported. However, the title field will be over-written with the name of the file. If importing from a source that already has metadata such as ePrints, then skip this step.

workflow.wfl_description: Generate fulltext index for a pid or whole repository (if no pid selected)

WorkflowState.wfs_description: The indexer is running as a background task. Progress can be followed on the My Fez page.

workflow.wfl_description: Generates a duplicates report.

WorkflowState.wfs_description: The Duplicates Report is being generated and may take some time to run. You will be notified by email when it completes. You can check the progress in the dashboard under 'Background Processes'.
Merging the records in the report if they match on the isi_loc element.
The report is being reprocessed to automatically merge records with matching isi_loc elements. You will be notified by email when this task completes.
Please enter some details about the report.
This state should email the user about the previous state finishing.

workflow.wfl_description: Creates a flash video dissemination of an archival original uploaded audio.

workflow.wfl_description: Regenerates the Auth Index for a selected Object or for the whole repository if no record is selected. This does not make changes to the fedora repository.

WorkflowState.wfs_description: The auth index for the selected object is being regenerated as a background task. The progress can be followed on your 'My_Fez' page.

workflow.wfl_title: Regenerate Image Datastreams On Selected Record

workflow.wfl_description: Regenerates the metadata index for the selected objects in fez. Recurses to any sub-objects. This index is used for searching for and listing objects.

WorkflowState.wfs_description: The index is being regenerated as a background process.

The index of the repository objects will be regenerated. If this is a collection, or community, then children will also be regenerated. This index is used to search and list objects.
This process will run in the background.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Add a custom comment relating to the deletion of one or more objects
Needs the select add files to record workflow behaviour to have been run first. Does the actual adding to the object.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Batch add files to record by Group
WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Needs the select add files to record workflow behaviour to have been run first. Does the actual adding to the object.
Needs the select batchimport to have been run first. Does the actual importing. Will use any template that has been set in 'set_template' or else will make mostly blank metadata.
Special state that displays information in the workflow state but disables the workflow buttons, instead it redirects them to the background processes page in my fez (after they have pressed ok).

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Bulk Assign Author ID to Record

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Accepts a list of PIDs and changes their grp_id value to a given Fez group ID parameter. Does this in each xml FezMD datastream and reindexes the object including security. Runs in background.
Accepts a list of PIDs and changes their FezMD usr_id value to a given Fez usr ID parameter. Does this in each xml FezMD datastream and reindexes the object including security. Runs in background.
Change a list of display types from a search or an ad-hoc query to a different display type. This will cause data loss where the display types don't overlap next time the pid is updated.
Change any search key value

Accepts a list of PIDs and changes their isMemberOf value to a new given collection PID parameter. Does this in each xml RELS-EXT datastream and reindexes the object including security. Runs in background.
Uploads selected PIDs to Thomson Reuter's Links Article Match Retrieve Service for identifying UTs.

Accepts a list of PIDs and changes their isMemberOf value to a new given collection PID parameter. Does this in each xml RELS-EXT datastream and reindexes the object including security. Runs in background.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Bulk Reindex and Regenerate Derivated Datastreams

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Accepts a list of PIDs and changes their isMemberOf value to a new given collection PID parameter. Does this in each xml RELS-EXT datastream and reindexes the object including security. Runs in background.
Strips abstracts from records - to be run on ESTI imported records
Strips Isi_loc from records in preparation of Links AMR Service data import.
Strips Scopus ID (EID) values from mods:identifier - eg for when they have been badly assigned. Mainly for use with the Ad Hoc query -> bulk workflow system.
Updates authors on a record using ESTI
Links to another workflow based on trigger wft_id stored in workflow var 'chain_wft_id'
Do the cloning. Assumes that the source pid has already been set and that the is_successor variable has been set.
Form to request options for clone record.
Accepts almost any audio format that FFMpeg supports and creates a flash video streaming dissemination copy.
Accepts almost any video format that FFMpeg suppors and creates a flash video streaming dissemination copy.
Reports duplicates
Processes a duplciates report and merges records based on matching isi_loc in the mods:identifier element.
This form allows percentage affiliations to be stored in a table for pids and authors. Part of HERDC requirements.
Exports a spreadsheet as a background process
Generate search index for fulltext searching.
Generates a duplicates report and saves it as a PID.
Sets the fedora 'D' object state.
Just displays the state information. Use to have an information only step.
Sends an email to the owner of the workflow to notify that a background process has finished. The workflow variable 'notify' can be used to set some specific message text.
Resize a given image to a 400x700 jpeg (constraining to ratio).
Regenerates the auth index for a selected pid. Or for the whole repository if no pid is selected.
Regenerates the metadata index for the selected objects in fez. Recurses to any sub-objects. This index is used for searching for and listing objects.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Regenerate Object Index and Derivated Datastreams
WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Regenerates the object (and any of its children) index, auth index, preservation metadata, exif data and derived datastreams (thumbs, streams etc)
This form allows registration of main chapter status for certain authors. Part of HERDC requirements.
Works out source pids (int he collection in $this->pid) for the workflow and puts them in $this->pids so that you can then run another step to select a destination which will overwrite $this->pid
Allows user to select a server local directory for a batch import.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Select Community, Collection and Doc type

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Select Community, Collection and Record using javascript to drill down.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Select SAN files to add to object
WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Allows the user to select a number of network files to be uploaded to the object. Especially useful for large files which cannot be uploaded via the browser.

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_title: Select SAN files to add to object by group
WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Allows the user to select a number of network files to be uploaded to the object. Especially useful for large files which cannot be uploaded via the browser.
Select a search key and its new value

WorkflowBehaviour.wfb_description: Message the students will get on the screen and then send them and libtheses@library.uq.edu.au an email.
Resize a given image to a 50x50 jpeg (constraining to ratio).
Takes a frame from the start of the video to use as a thumbnail.
Resize a given image to a 800x600 jpeg (constraining to ratio).
